shortdesc.ph: Callback when the token is about to expire in 30 seconds.
Occurs when the token is about to expire in 30 seconds.
Callback when the token is about to expire in 30 seconds.
Callback when the token will expire in 30 seconds.

p.codeblock: final void Function(RtcConnection connection, String token)? onTokenPrivilegeWillExpire;
public virtual void OnTokenPrivilegeWillExpire(RtcConnection connection, string token) {}

section.p:
When you receive this callback, you need to generate a new token on your server and update it using one of the following methods:
Single-channel scenario:
Call to pass in the new token.
Call to leave the current channel, then call with the new token to rejoin.
Multi-channel scenario: Call with the new token.

When you receive this callback, you need to generate a new token on your server and update it using one of the following methods:
Single-channel scenario:
Call to pass in the new token.
Call to leave the current channel, then call with the new token to rejoin the channel.
Multi-channel scenario: Call with the new token.

When you receive this callback, you need to generate a new token on your server and update it using one of the following methods:
Single-channel scenario:
Call to pass in the new token.
Call to leave the current channel, then pass in the new token when calling to rejoin the channel.
Multi-channel scenario: Call to pass in the new token.

When you receive this callback, you need to generate a new token on your server and update the token using one of the following methods:
Single-channel scenario:
Call to pass in the new token.
Call to leave the current channel, then call with the new token to rejoin the channel.
Multi-channel scenario: Call to pass in the new token.

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: During audio and video interaction, the SDK triggers this callback 30 seconds before the token expires to remind the app to update the token.
During an audio or video call, the SDK triggers this callback 30 seconds before the token expires to remind the app to update the token.
During audio and video interaction, the SDK triggers this callback 30 seconds before the token expires to remind the app to update the token.
During audio and video interaction, the SDK triggers this callback 30 seconds before the token expires to remind the app to update the token.
